question: In which movie did she play two roles, and what were they?
answer: In 1989, she played Ariel and Vanessa in The Little Mermaid.

answer: Manchester United has won the First Division/Premier League 20 times.

question: In which seasons did Manchester United win the FA Cup?
How many times has Manchester United won the Football League Cup/EFL Cup?
answer: Manchester United has won a total of 6 Football League Cup/EFL Cup titles.

question: In which seasons did Manchester United win the European Cup/UEFA Champions League?
answer: Manchester United won the European Cup/UEFA Champions League in 1967–68, 1998–99, and 2007–08.

question: Does Manchester United have more FA Charity Shield/Community Shield titles or First Division/Premier League titles?
answer: Manchester United has more FA Charity Shield/Community Shield titles (21) than First Division/Premier League titles (20s).

answer: North Road (1878–1893) · Bank Street (1893–1910) · Old Trafford (1910–present) ·

13. Venice Film Festival - Special Lion for Lifetime Achievement - Won

answer: Baden-Württemberg (37), Berlin (5), Brandenburg (1), Hamburg (3), Hesse (15), Lower Saxony (16), Mecklenburg-Vorpommern (6), North Rhine-Westphalia (37), Rhineland-Palatinate (13), Saarland (4), Saxony (16), Saxony-Anhalt (4), Schleswig-Holstein (9), Thuringia (7).
